OAuthLogin.title: OAuthLogin
OAuthLogin.description:
OAuth2 login form model.

This model is used to represent the data required for OAuth2 password grant type authentication.
It includes fields for username, password, grant type, client ID, client secret, scope, and scopes.
refference: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc6749

type_.description: A URI reference that identifies the type of problem.

status.description: The HTTP status code for this problem occurrence.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.
examples: The user you are looking for is either not created, or in-active

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence.

instance.description: A URI reference identifying this specific problem occurrence.

ProblemDetail.title: ProblemDetail
ProblemDetail.description:
## Specification:
    - RFC 9457: https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc9457.html

This schema provides a standardized way to represent errors in HTTP APIs,
allowing clients to understand error responses in a structured format.

type_.description: A URI reference that identifies the type of problem.

status.description: The HTTP status code for this problem occurrence.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.
examples: The user you are looking for is either not created, or in-active

instance.description: A URI reference identifying this specific problem occurrence.

examples.title: Check Your Params
examples.detail: Example detail for this error type
examples.instance: Example Instance for this error type
